item.description: It’s wonderful to be on the stage again. This was the first solo concert I’ve had in many years, and I am so happy that Hans-Phillip at the Vinyl Reservat in Göttingen agreed to let me play there.

On the Friday, March 15th, I’ll have the great pleasure to play in Dabis Kaffeestube, Rote Straße 39, in Göttingen. The concert is at 18:00. The entrance is free and a hat will be passed around at the end of the concert.
I’m proud to present a joint concert with Benedikt Ni as part of the series Gewölbeklänge in September 2019. The concert will be held at the Kleiner Ratskeller, Jüdenstrasse 30, Göttingen.

An evening filled with music from both sides the Atlantic. From Sweden to Ireland, from Finland to the US. Banjo, fiddle, footstomping, and occasional singing! Entrance is free, spending after the concert is encouraged!
I’ll be playing as part of the yearly folk festival at the Vinyl Reservat, Rote Strasse, Göttingen.

Bright nights, mosquitoes and gnats, people swirling around the rotundas to the almost hypnotic 3/4 beat of a polska. The dance traditions of Sweden are very alive, and since a large number of talented Swedish artists are gaining attention internationally, many musicians have already made contact with Swedish dance music.
